alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dorchester County through 830 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambridge, moving southeast at 25 mph. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. While a tornado is not immediately likely, remain alert for any warnings. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Church Creek and Bucktown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
